mapper.select: select m.coupon_issue_num, c.coupon_no, coupon_name, c.coupon_kind, coupon_content, coupon_price, coupon_pricerate, coupon_startdate, coupon_enddate, use_date from coupon c join mem_cupon m on (c.coupon_no = m.coupon_no) join orders o on (o.mem_no = m.mem_no) where order_no = #{orderNo} and o.coupon_issue_num = m.coupon_issue_num
